SENT.plain: A rare case of aseptic thrombosis of the left vein of Labbé in a young woman is reported
Cerebral venous thrombosis was suggested by computed tomography and confirmed after intravenous administration of contrast by computed tomography venography
The combination of the clinical setting with the findings on the non-enhanced CT may favour the diagnosis of vein of Labbé thrombosis
The diagnosis can be confirmed on computed tomography venography
